name: FascinatingCatFacts
0:
”Alexa, Open Fascinating Cat Facts”
”Alexa, Play Fascinating Cat Facts”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fascinating cat facts
des:
Cats are Cool! Fascinating Cat Facts is an Alexa skill that will give you a randomly selected fact every day about that enigmatic and independent creature who chooses to live with you. You may be surprised or amazed at some of these little know facts about cats. 

Do you know why it is said that a cat has nine lives?
Are cats the only animals that purr?
Is owning a cat good for your health?

Get the answers to these questions and much more in Fascinating Cat Facts.

Simply open the skill by saying "Alexa, open Fascinating Cat Facts"

Come back every day to learn a new fact about cats.
